questions.question_text: Lifecycle Events includes an activity set that can be used to cancel and revert work done in a lifecycle event case. What is this process called?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is correct

Selected Answer: D
"Cancel and revert work done in a lifecycle event case with the rescind process."

Selected Answer: D
It should be "D"

Selected Answer: C
C. Activity Field Mapping

"Activity Field Mappings are used to define the relationships between fields in various tables."

Selected Answer: C
HR Implementation ebook page 85: Activity Field Mappings are used to define the relationships between fields in various tables.

questions.question_text: When configuring a Lifecycle Event, which of the following is used to define the relationships between fields in various tables?
Which of the following features allows employees to delegate their tasks to other employees for specific date and time ranges based on delegation rules?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
HR Implementation ebook page 152: Granular delegation allows employees to delegate their tasks to other employees for specific date and time ranges based on delegation rules.

choices.C: It manages the dependencies of activities within an activity set.
choices.A: It tracks the progress of Lifecycle Events and onboarding cases using the dashboards.
choices.D: It combines Lifecycle Event cases and Journey Accelerator action plans.
choices.B: It creates templates for plan and to-do tasks that managers, employees, and mentors can access.

questions.question_text: What is the purpose of Journey designer?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
HR Implementation ebook page 94: Journey designer combines Lifecycle Event cases and Journey Accelerator action plans

Selected Answer: A
HR Implementation e book page 84
